channel.title: Shalva Gegia
channel.description: I'm a software engineer based in Amsterdam, Netherlands. I'm passionate about building products that solve real-world problems.

item.title: Shooting Kodak Vision3 500T in daylight without 85B (warming) filter
item.description: Recently, I had the opportunity to visit Vatican City in Italy. I brought my beloved Nikon FA camera with me, loaded with Kodak Vision3 500T film. I didn't have a warming filter with me, as I've never owned one and don't like using filters inâ€¦

item.title: Analog News
item.description: Hello there, film photographers! I recently worked on a project called Analog News that I'd like to share with you, but first I'd like to give you some background on it. When I try new things, such as art, photography, or whatever, I try to readâ€¦

item.title: ðŸ“¸ Scanning film with a digital camera
item.description: In this day and age,Â if you are a film shooter, you know that digitalizing film is inevitable. Sure, it's great fun to have a darkroom and play with silver gelatin prints for both color and B&W, but let's face it, we all have Instagram and want toâ€¦
